channel.title: Python on PR
channel.description: Recent content in Python on PR

item.title: Pilapse - Raspberry Pi Camera and Timelapse
item.description: It is a simple python script to capture timelapse with few more addition option than raspistill -tl. Built-in command usage: raspistill -t 30000 -tl 2000 -o image%04d.

item.title: iForce - Sublime text plugin for salesforce development.
item.description: I wrote a small plugin for sublime text to develop salesforce. I’m glad to share one of my idea to project execution.
